AT.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
AT.description: Super Ghouls'n Ghosts ist das dritte Spiel in der legendären Ghosts'n Goblins-Reihe und folgt dem tapferen Sir Arthur auf seinem Weg durch dämonenverseuchte Lande, um die entführte Prinzessin zu retten. Kämpfe dich durch gefährliche Level und besiege die jeweiligen Endgegner, um weiterzukommen. Aber sei vorsichtig: Wenn Arthur getroffen wird, zerbricht seine Rüstung und ihm bleiben nur noch seine Boxershorts! Diese Version für Game Boy Advance™ beinhaltet einen exklusiven Arrange Mode, der noch schwierigere Level und Endgegner enthält, die auf den früheren Spielen basieren. Bist du der Herausforderung gewachsen?

AU.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
AU.description: The third installment in the legendary Ghosts’n Goblins™ series, Super Ghouls'n Ghosts follows brave Sir Arthur’s quest through demon-infested lands to rescue the kidnapped princess. Battle through deadly stages and beat each level’s boss to progress. But watch out: if Arthur is injured his armour will break, leaving him in just his boxer shorts! This Game Boy Advance™ version includes an exclusive Arrange Mode featuring even tougher levels and bosses based on the previous games. Are you up to the challenge?

BG.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
BG.description: The third installment in the legendary Ghosts’n Goblins™ series, Super Ghouls'n Ghosts follows brave Sir Arthur’s quest through demon-infested lands to rescue the kidnapped princess. Battle through deadly stages and beat each level’s boss to progress. But watch out: if Arthur is injured his armour will break, leaving him in just his boxer shorts! This Game Boy Advance™ version includes an exclusive Arrange Mode featuring even tougher levels and bosses based on the previous games. Are you up to the challenge?

BE.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
BE.description: Dans Super Ghouls'n Ghosts, le troisième épisode de la série légendaire Ghosts’n Goblins™, incarnez le courageux Sir Arthur et parcourez le royaume infesté de démons pour secourir la princesse qui a été kidnappée. Traversez des stages périlleux et terrassez le boss de chaque niveau pour progresser dans le jeu. Mais attention : si Arthur se blesse, son armure se brisera et il se retrouvera en caleçon ! Cette version sur Game Boy Advance™ comprend un mode Arrange exclusif doté de niveaux encore plus difficiles et de boss encore plus puissants inspirés des jeux précédents. Serez-vous à la hauteur ?

ES.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
ES.description: En Super Ghouls'n Ghosts, la tercera entrega de la legendaria saga Ghosts’n Goblins™, sir Arthur emprende un viaje a través de una tierra infestada de demonios para rescatar a la princesa secuestrada. Esquiva los peligros y derrota a los jefes de cada nivel para seguir tu camino, pero ándate con cuidado: si Arthur resulta herido, se romperá su armadura ¡y la única protección con la que contará serán sus calzoncillos! Esta versión para Game Boy Advance™ incluye un modo exclusivo con niveles y jefes de episodios anteriores que requieren una destreza aún mayor. ¿Aceptas el desafío?

IT.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
IT.description: Terzo titolo della leggendaria serie di Ghosts’n Goblins™, Super Ghouls'n Ghosts segue il coraggioso Sir Arthur attraverso terre infestate da atroci demoni nella sua missione per salvare la principessa rapita. Fatti strada per livelli pieni di insidie fino a sconfiggere i boss. Ma fai attenzione, subire un colpo potrebbe costarti l'armatura e lasciarti letteralmente in mutande! Questa versione per Game Boy Advance™ include in esclusiva la modalità "Arrange", che ti permette di affrontare livelli e boss dei titoli precedenti, ancora più impegnativi. Hai il coraggio di accettare la sfida?

NL.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
NL.description: Super Ghouls'n Ghosts is het derde deel in de legendarische Ghosts’n Goblins™-reeks. De koene Sir Arthur is weer op pad door het door demonen geteisterde land om de ontvoerde prinses te redden. Vecht je een weg door gevaarlijke gebieden en versla de eindbazen. Pas wel goed op, want je verliest je wapenrusting als je gewond raakt! En enkel gehuld in een boxershort neemt niemand je serieus. Deze Game Boy Advance™-versie biedt de unieke spelstand Arrange die de moeilijkheidsgraad verhoogd. Durf jij de uitdaging aan?

NZ.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
NZ.description: The third installment in the legendary Ghosts’n Goblins™ series, Super Ghouls'n Ghosts follows brave Sir Arthur’s quest through demon-infested lands to rescue the kidnapped princess. PL.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
PL.description: The third installment in the legendary Ghosts’n Goblins™ series, Super Ghouls'n Ghosts follows brave Sir Arthur’s quest through demon-infested lands to rescue the kidnapped princess. Battle through deadly stages and beat each level’s boss to progress. But watch out: if Arthur is injured his armour will break, leaving him in just his boxer shorts! This Game Boy Advance™ version includes an exclusive Arrange Mode featuring even tougher levels and bosses based on the previous games. Are you up to the challenge?

PT.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
PT.description: Em Super Ghouls'n Ghosts, o terceiro jogo da lendária série de Ghosts’n Goblins™, acompanhamos o corajoso Sir Arthur na sua aventura por territórios infestados de demónios para resgatar a princesa raptada. Combate em níveis mortais e derrota o boss de cada nível para conseguires avançar. Mas tem cuidado, pois se Arthur for ferido, a sua armadura partir-se-á deixando-o apenas em roupa interior! Esta versão para Game Boy Advance™ inclui o Arrange Mode, um modo exclusivo com níveis mais desafiantes e bosses mais poderosos, inspirados em jogos anteriores. Estarás à altura do desafio?

RU.name: Super Ghouls 'N Ghosts
RU.description: Представляем Super Ghouls'n Ghosts для Game Boy Advance™ — третий эпизод легендарной игровой серии Ghosts’n Goblins™. На сей раз Sir Arthur отправляется в дальние края, где ему предстоит сразиться с сонмом демонов и спасти похищенную принцессу. Пройдите это испытание вместе с ним! На каждом уровне вас подстерегает смертельная опасность. Кроме того, чтобы перейти на следующий, вам предстоит победить босса. Будьте начеку: если рыцаря ранят, его доспехи падут, и он предстанет перед вашим взором в одних боксерских шортах! Вы уже отточили свое боевое мастерство? Оцените режим Arrange Mode, где вас ожидают более жестокие боссы и более сложные уровни, созданные по мотивам предыдущих эпизодов игры. Вы готовы принять этот вызов?

SE.description: The third installment in the legendary Ghosts’n Goblins™ series, Super Ghouls'n Ghosts follows brave Sir Arthur’s quest through demon-infested lands to rescue the kidnapped princess.
